triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The core technique combining reinforcement learning with deep learning to train the robot movement skills.

triples.name: Humanoid robot
triples.relevance: The type of bipedal robot platform used to perform soccer skills and movement tasks.

triples.name: Soccer robot
triples.relevance: The novel application of training a humanoid robot to play one-versus-one soccer with sophisticated behavioral strategies.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The foundational machine learning paradigm for training agents through interactions with their environment.

triples.name: Transfer learning
triples.relevance: The zero-shot sim-to-real transfer technique enabling knowledge from simulation to transfer to real robots.
